name: Have You Seen My Friends?
description:
Online Multiplayer Only:

  • Forward this port: 7777
  • Open the game
  • Replace 'localHost' with your public IP address (google 'what is my ip')
  • Click 'Host (Server + Client)'
  • Your friends need to enter the same IP address
  • And Click 'Client'

Once in a game, your objective is to navigate the forest and find your friends. Once you are all in the same place, the game ends, and you win!

At the moment, all players need to restart their game in order to re-play :/

Credits:

Programming - Josh Kitchen

Art - Jasjanken

3d Models - Tom and Simon
